report.title: Moth Trap Samples list for scheme coordinators with trap attributes
report.description: Lists samples for scheme coordinators with location attributecsf.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional csf JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id = csf.id LEFT JOIN locations l on l.id = csf.location_id AND l.deleted = false LEFT JOIN locations pl on pl.id = l.parent_id AND pl.deleted = false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav_trap_type ON lav_trap_type.location_id = l.id AND lav_trap_type.location_attribute_id = #trap_type_attr_id# AND lav_trap_type.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_trap_type ON ctt_trap_type.id = lav_trap_type.int_value LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav_other_trap ON lav_other_trap.location_id = l.id AND lav_other_trap.location_attribute_id = #other_trap_type_attr_id# AND lav_other_trap.deleted = false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav_lamp_type ON lav_lamp_type.location_id = l.id AND lav_lamp_type.location_attribute_id = #lamp_type_attr_id# AND lav_lamp_type.deleted = false #joins# WHERE csf.survey_id = #survey_id# AND csf.training = #training# AND (#drupal_user_id# in (#drupal_user_id_manager_overrides#) OR pl.id in (#indexed_location_list_context#) OR /* Some records do not seem to have a location with a parent that is a country, so the above line doesn't work */ csf.location_ids @> ARRAY[#indexed_location_list_context#])

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: The ID of the Moth Trap location type.

param.name: trap_type_attr_id
param.description: The ID of the attribute holding the moth trap type.

param.name: other_trap_type_attr_id
param.description: The ID of the attribute holding the description of other moth trap typecsf.

param.name: lamp_type_attr_id
param.description: The ID of the attribute holding the moth lamp type.

param.name: drupal_user_id_manager_overrides
param.description: Comma separated list of Drupal user IDs of managers who are allowed see data for all schemes.

param.name: drupal_user_id
param.description: Drupal user ID of current logged-in user.

column.name: lamp_types
column.sql:
string_agg(distinct concat( lav_lamp_type.text_value::json->>'quantity', ' x ', CASE WHEN position('Please describe' in lav_lamp_type.text_value::json->>'type_term') = 0 THEN lav_lamp_type.text_value::json->>'type_term' ELSE concat( substring(lav_lamp_type.text_value::json->>'type_term' for (position('Please describe' in lav_lamp_type.text_value::json->>'type_term') - 1)), lav_lamp_type.text_value::json->>'description' ) END ) , E',
\n')
